snippet: The American institution’s first permanent outpost abroad will be part of a complex in the east of the city called Olympicopolis, to open in 2021.
abstract: Smithsonian Institution announces collaboration with Victoria and Albert Museum to open permanent exhibition space in London's Queen Elizabeth Olympic Park called V&A East.
lead_paragraph: The American institution’s first permanent outpost abroad will be part of a complex in the east of the city called Olympicopolis, to open in 2021.

headline.main: Smithsonian to Open London Exhibition Space With Victoria and Albert Museum
